Sentencas: The present study was focused on the effects of co-doping on the conductivity enhancement of CeO2-based solid ceramics for application as electrolytes in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) and the correlation of ionic conductivity variations with micro structural alterations resulting from the addition of co-dopants.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nano-crystalline Dy and Pr co-doped ceria Ce0.8Pr0.2-xDyxO2-delta solid solutions were successfully synthesized by sol-gel auto-combustion and innovative densification by energy efficient microwave sintering (MS) at 1300 A degrees C.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The XRD results in concurrence with Raman studies ascertained the formation of cubic fluorite structure in the entire range of composition.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The lattice parameters obtained by Rietveld refinement showed lattice contraction with increased dysprosium content.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: MS has resulted in improved densification and the relative densities of all the samples were noticed above 96% of the theoretical density.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: TEM images confirmed the nano-crystalline character in the as-prepared samples with the particle sizes measured around 20 nm.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SEM micrographs showed spherical faceted near-uniform grains (average grain sizes around 225 nm) with distinct grain boundaries and negligible porosity.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Formation of oxygen vacancies and their concentration in all the samples was assessed with the help of Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Total ionic conductivity values and activation energies were measured depending on the Dy content.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the best composition was found to be 6.8 mS cm(-1) at 500 A degrees C. Thermal expansion co-efficient of the samples was matched with that of the commonly used electrode materials.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results gave rise to the firm conclusion that the investigated co-doped ceria has the potential to be utilized as an electrolyte for IT-SOFC applications.
Titulo: Structural, electrical and thermal studies on microwave sintered Dy and Pr co-doped ceria ceramics as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
